60 struct FlexParams
61 {
62  int mNumIterations;
63 
64  float mGravity[3];
65  float mRadius;
66  float mSolidRestDistance;
67  float mFluidRestDistance;
68 
69  // common params
70  float mDynamicFriction;
71  float mStaticFriction;
72  float mParticleFriction;
73  float mRestitution;
74  float mAdhesion;
75  float mSleepThreshold;
76  float mMaxVelocity;
77  float mShockPropagation;
78  float mDissipation;
79  float mDamping;
80  float mEnableCCD;
81 
82  // cloth params
83  float mWind[3];
84  float mDrag;
85  float mLift;
86 
87  // fluid params
88  bool mFluid;
89  float mCohesion;
90  float mSurfaceTension;
91  float mViscosity;
92  float mVorticityConfinement;
93  float mAnisotropyScale;
94  float mSmoothing;
95  float mSolidPressure;
96  float mFreeSurfaceDrag;
97  float mBuoyancy;
98 
99  // diffuse params
100  float mDiffuseThreshold;
101  float mDiffuseBuoyancy;
102  float mDiffuseDrag;
103  int mDiffuseBallistic;
104  float mDiffuseSortAxis[3];
105 
106  // rigid params
107  float mPlasticThreshold;
108  float mPlasticCreep;
109 
110  // collision params
111  float mCollisionDistance;
112  float mParticleCollisionMargin;
113  float mShapeCollisionMargin;
114 
115  float mPlanes[8][4];
116  int mNumPlanes;
117 
118  FlexRelaxationMode mRelaxationMode;
119  float mRelaxationFactor;
120 };

125 enum FlexPhase
126 {
127  eFlexPhaseGroupMask = 0x00ffffff,
128 
129  eFlexPhaseSelfCollide = 1 << 24,
130  eFlexPhaseFluid = 1 << 25,
131 };
132 
136 FLEX_API inline int flexMakePhase(int group, int flags) { return (group & eFlexPhaseGroupMask) | flags; }
